metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5815 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An integer overflow error within the "parse_qt()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.12 can be exploited to trigger an infinite loop via a specially crafted Apple QuickTime file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5815` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.2
libraw16 - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required
